General.Name: TECO Image Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: Teco Image Systems Co., Ltd. provides OEM and ODM services to imaging and communication products industries worldwide. The company is involved in the design, development, and manufacture of multi-function printing devices, plain paper facsimiles, digital copiers, and color scanners. It also offers mechanical subsystems comprising control panels and automatic document feeders; optical subsystems, such as scan units; and electronic sub-systems, including printer controller cards, printer network cards, Internet fax cards, fax controllers, and copier controllers. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
